# Omar Al Matar (Bewinxed)

Healthcare Informatics MSc + Fullstack Developer

Building developer tools with TypeScript, Svelte, Python, Go, and Rust. Currently at **Supabase** working on WebAuthn/SCIM authentication, and with **HMC Ambulance Services**.

### river.ts ‚Äî ‚≠ê 94

[![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/9145989/337331855-091aba33-d05b-496e-a44b-aa59e9ff469d.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..-sFK4YmyblIvrXTCico1FEQk4mnWHCByxlOgP9T_fcY)](https://github.com/Bewinxed/river.ts)

Type-safe, Composable Server-Sent Events & WebSockets
- Easy real-time events with full TypeScript type-safety
- - Works with both SSE and WebSockets
  - - Automatic reconnection & chunking support
